divs: Sighting Detailsi was coming back from the movies with my girlfriend when all sudden on 104 i look up in the sky a bright light cutting thru grab my attention i looked at it for a good 15 second and then told my girlfriend to look at the plane when she looked it up and try finding it disappear right front of my eyes so fast we both looked for 5-10 min to see if we couldve found it like it was a plane but the sky was clear as it could be
Summary: bright light in the sky i couldve seen the light was coming thru the clouds star-like
